title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Possible physical effects were (1 point):

  1. he is struck dumb or becomes silent; he does not talk; he is silent

  2. his hair stands on end

  3. his voice sticks/stuck in his throat; he lost his voice; his voice was gone; his voice falters; he was silenced

The Latin support (1 point; one of the following):

  1. obmutuit

  2. arrectaeque horrore comae (horrore could be omitted)

  3. vox faucibus haesit (faucibus could be omitted)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Student response earns one of the available points.
